price: Hao ni ambao wameamini na wakawa wanamcha Mungu.
footnotes: Na hao ndio walio yasadiki yote yaliyo toka kwa Mwenyezi Mungu, na wakaifuata Haki, na wakayaepuka maasi, na wakamkhofu Mwenyezi Mungu katika kila walitendalo.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
